parameters.query: /services/authentication/current-context | rename realname as Name, username as userName | fields Name, userName

content.template:
Follow the prompts to manage this Investigation's ownership and status.

Message prompt name: assignment_decision
The investigation status has been changed to "In Progress" and it has been assigned to: {0}

parameters.query: /services/authentication/users |fields title roles realname|rename title as userName|rename realname as Name | where match(roles,"ess")

content.template: The investigation status has been changed to "In Progress" and it has been assigned to: {0}

debug.description: Print debug messages with the type and value of 0-10 different inputs. This is useful for checking the values of input data or the outputs of other playbook blocks.
debug.label: debug
debug.name: debug
